traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: Zalto deals double damage to objects and structures.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Zalto wears a {@item ring of lightning resistance}.

traits.name: Tackle
entries: When Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

actions.name: Maul
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 28 (6d6 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rock
entries: Ranged atk +11 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. 29 (4d10 + 7 damage) bludgeoning damage.
